alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern East Baton Rouge Parish through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baker, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Brownfields, Merrydale and Baton Rouge Airport. This includes Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 5 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
